name: A late night drink
description:
You wake up in the middle of the night , desperate to get some water... but things turn a little weird right when you decide to satisfy yourself with it...

Can you find out what's happening and escape?

      "A late night drink" is a short horror game that provides the player with many scary experiences in a short period of time.

        Avarage session play time : 10-15 minutes (more or less)!
